rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with a wide door and tactile indicators.
Spacious living room with large windows for natural light. Designed with an open layout to enhance ventilation.
Integrated dining space within the living area.
Contemporary kitchen with modern appliances and open layout. Windows on east for morning light.
Spacious master bedroom with a large balcony oriented towards the west for evening light and fresh air. Wheelchair accessible design elements included.
Balcony attached to the master bedroom for relaxation and additional natural ventilation.
Guest bedroom with its own balcony. Designed to be wheelchair accessible with ample space for maneuverability.
Balcony adjacent to the guest bedroom offering natural light and fresh air.
Cabinetry and storage closet for miscellaneous items. Designed to maximize space efficiency.

openings.description: Large double-glazed windows for natural light and ventilation
Two-car garage accessible via a covered walkway with ramps for wheelchair access
